member.name: M:Minesweeper.GameMap.LeftMouseButtonClicked(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: If the mouse is hovering over a button this function reveals what's underneat of the button

The number of the row that the mouse is hoovering over when the button is clicked

member.name: M:Minesweeper.GameMap.RevealMineSpace(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the button covering the underlying cell either reveals the number lying under the cell, reveals the neighboring cells until a number is found, or ends the game is the button is hiding a bomb.
member.param: The number of the column that the mouse is hoovering over
The number of the row that the mouse is hoovering over

member.name: M:Minesweeper.GameMap.RightMouseButtonClicked
member.summary: Marks the button as unsafe if the button has not been marked previously or if it is marked as safe before the call Marks the button as safe if the button is currently marked as unsafe.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.GameMap.ColumnRowInGameArray(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the column and row are actually displayed in the game
member.param: The column that the mouse is hoovering over
The row that the mouse is hoovering over
member.returns: True if the column and row are valid, false otherwise

The number of the row that the mouse has just clicked

member.summary: This method creates an instance of the GameMap class from a load.
member.param: This is the number of columns that the new map will have.
This is the number of rows that the new map will have.
This is a two diminsional array of bool that describes if there is a mine at the current position of the array. A value of 1 means that the array contains a mine.
This is a two diminsional array of an enum. The enum represents the current state of a mine space that is denoted by the column and row index.

This value represents how many rows the object that called this method has.
